EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Lean Startup Conference_Q415.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed for dinner on Nov 18th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You are confirmed to attend our exclusive VIP dinner with Pivotal on Wednesday, November 18. Be sure to join us for drinks and networking before dinner and panel discussions.
Please see below for calendar details:
Date: November 18, 2015 Time: 7:00 PM - 9:30 PM Location: Pivotal <http://pivotal.io/locations/sanfrancisco>, 875 Howard Street, 5th Floor San Francisco, CA 94103
Agenda
7:00pm Drinks & Networking 7:30pm Dinner & Presentation 8:30pm Fishbowl Panel Discussion 9:15pm Q&A 9:30pm Event Concludes
{{my.Add to My Calendar:default=Edit me}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io>.
We look forward to seeing you,
The Pivotal Team
